fields.headline: Christmas in Wonderland
fields.bodyText: Is it too Scroogeish to suggest that had Patrick Swayze still been with us this elderly yuletide turkey (filmed in 2007) might have stayed on the shelf? Certainly the note of morbidity lends faint interest to a film that's like spending an hour and a half inside an Argos catalogue. Swayze plays Wayne, long-suffering father to hormonal Danny (Cameron Bright, who had a bath with Nicole Kidman in Birth), bike-mad Brian, and cutie-pie Mary - big on giggles, mad for Santa, with a faint resemblance to Linda Blair. The smaller two go wild in the aisles of a shopping mall after they find a holdall of counterfeit cash mislaid by dopey conmen. Tim Curry co-stars as a Canadian mountie; Carmen Electra as an evil genius. Ahem.
